pullRequest.title: Enable gcc toolchain on Linux PPC LE platforms
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enable gcc toolchain in linux_ppc-64_le, linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le
build specs. Enable OpenJ9 and J9 ddr flags.
Fix references to *_gcc specs in makefiles and other build resources.
Rename cmake specs for Linux PPC LE:

linux_ppc-64_le_gcc to linux_ppc-64_le
linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le_gcc to linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le
and update accordingly.
Remove linux_ppc-64_le_gcc and linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le_gcc specs.

Depends on
ibmruntimes/openj9-openjdk-jdk8#412
ibmruntimes/openj9-openjdk-jdk11#303
ibmruntimes/openj9-openjdk-jdk14#53
ibmruntimes/openj9-openjdk-jdk#200
[skip ci]
Signed-off-by: Violeta Sebe vsebe@ca.ibm.com

commit.message:
Enable gcc toolchain on Linux PPC LE platforms

Enable gcc toolchain in linux_ppc-64_le, linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le
build specs. Enable OpenJ9 and J9 ddr flags.
Fix references to *_gcc specs in makefiles and other build resources.
Rename cmake specs for Linux PPC LE:
- linux_ppc-64_le_gcc to linux_ppc-64_le
- linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le_gcc to linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le
and update accordingly.
Remove linux_ppc-64_le_gcc and linux_ppc-64_cmprssptrs_le_gcc specs.

[skip ci]

Signed-off-by: Violeta Sebe <vsebe@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: I think this and the next are  obsolete properties that could be removed from all specs? These values aren't set in the non-cmprssptrs spec, so I'm guessing they aren't used. Anyway, if we make changes for this, it should be done separately.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -129,7 +129,10 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		<flag id="build_java8" value="true"/>
 		<flag id="build_java9" value="false"/>
 		<flag id="build_product" value="true"/>
+		<flag id="build_openj9" value="true"/>
